exceptions.exn: In environment this : nid W : world A : Type x : A Unable to unify "prog W A this" with "ret_prog \\In has_spec this W ret_s".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
this: nid
W: world
A: Type
x: A

Goal:
ret_prog \In has_spec this W ret_s

Premises:
world = (context * hooks)%type : Type
ret_s = (xPredT, fun (i : state) (y : A) (m : state) => network_rely W this i m /\ y = x) : spec A
nid = nat : Set
has_spec : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type), spec A -> Simpl_Pred (prog W A this)
ret_prog = Prog (or_introl (erefl Unfinished)) : prog W A this
DTLattice.bot_spec : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s : spec A), DTLattice.bot_prg this W A \In has_spec this W s
DTLattice.sup_spec : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s : spec A) (es : Pred (DTbin this W s)), DTLattice.sup_prog es \In has_spec this W s
DTbin_make : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s : spec A) (prog_of : prog W A this), prog_of \In has_spec this W s -> DTbin this W s
Record DTbin (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s : spec A) : Type := DTbin_make { prog_of : prog W A this; _ : prog_of \In has_spec this W s } Arguments DTbin.DTbin _ _ [A]%type_scope Arguments DTbin.DTbin_make [this W] [A]%type_scope [s prog_of]
alwsafe_bnd : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A B : Type) (p1 : proc this W A) (p12 : proc this W B) (s1 : state) (pp2 : A -> Pred (proc this W B)), p12 \In pcat p1 pp2 -> always s1 p1 (fun (s2 : state) (p2 : proc this W A) => forall (p : proc this W B) (v : A), p2 = Ret v -> p \In pp2 v -> alwsafe s2 p) -> alwsafe s1 p12
alw_coh : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc this W A) (P : state -> proc this W A -> Prop), always s p P -> s \In Coh W
rely_split : forall (V W : world) (K : hooks) (w : injects V W K) (this : nid) (s1 : state) (s1' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (s2 : state) (s2' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet), s1 \In Coh V -> s2 \In Coh V -> network_rely W this (s1 \+ s1') (s2 \+ s2') -> network_rely V this s1 s2 /\ network_rely (inj_ext w) this s1' s2'
aft_bnd : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A B : Type) (p1 : proc this W A) (p12 : proc this W B) (pp2 : A -> Pred (proc this W B)) (s1 : state) (P : B -> state -> Prop), p12 \In pcat p1 pp2 -> after s1 p1 (fun (v : A) (s : state) => forall p : proc this W B, p \In pp2 v -> after s p P) -> after s1 p12 P
alw_coh' : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc this W A) (scs : seq schedule) (P : state -> proc this W A -> Prop), always_sc s p scs P -> s \In Coh W
alw_unfin : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s1 : state) (P : state -> proc this W A -> Prop), s1 \In Coh W -> (forall s2 : state, network_rely W this s1 s2 -> P s2 Unfinished) -> always s1 Unfinished P
alw_bnd : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A B : Type) (p1 : proc this W A) (p12 : proc this W B) (pp2 : A -> Pred (proc this W B)) (s1 : state) (P : state -> B -> Prop), p12 \In pcat p1 pp2 -> always s1 p1 (fun (s2 : state) (p2 : proc this W A) => forall (p : proc this W B) (v : A), p2 = Ret v -> p \In pp2 v -> always s2 p (fun (s : state) (q : proc this W B) => forall v0 : B, q = Ret v0 -> P s v0)) -> always s1 p12 (fun (s : state) (p : proc this W B) => forall v : B, p = Ret v -> P s v)
alw_imp : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc this W A) (P1 P2 : state -> proc this W A -> Prop), (forall (s0 : state) (p0 : proc this W A), s0 \In Coh W -> P1 s0 p0 -> P2 s0 p0) -> always s p P1 -> always s p P2
prog_unfin : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s : spec A) (e : DTbin this W s), Unfinished \In e
DTLattice.sup_supL : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s : spec A) (es : Pred_Class) (e : DTbin this W s), (forall c : DTbin this W s, c \In es -> DTLattice.leq c e) -> DTLattice.leq (DTLattice.sup es) e
rely_ext : forall (V W : world) (K : hooks), injects V W K -> forall (this : nid) (i : state) (j : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (s : state), i \In Coh V -> network_rely W this (i \+ j) s -> exists i' j' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet, s = i' \+ j' /\ i' \In Coh V
alw_imp' : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc this W A) (scs : seq schedule) (P1 P2 : state -> proc this W A -> Prop), (forall (s0 : state) (p0 : proc this W A), s0 \In Coh W -> P1 s0 p0 -> P2 s0 p0) -> always_sc s p scs P1 -> always_sc s p scs P2
alw_ret' : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s1 : state) (v : A) (scs : seq schedule) (P : state -> proc this W A -> Prop), s1 \In Coh W -> (forall s2 : state, network_rely W this s1 s2 -> P s2 (Ret v)) -> always_sc s1 (Ret v) scs P
Actions.send_action_wrapper : forall (W : world) (p : protocol) (this : nid) (l : Label), getProtocol W l = p -> forall st : send_trans (coh p), st \In snd_trans p -> seq nat -> nid -> Actions.action W (seq nat) this
alw_inject : forall (V W : world) (K : hooks) (A : Type) (w : injects V W K) (this : nid) (p : proc this V A) (P : state -> proc this V A -> Prop) (i j : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet), i \+ j \In Coh W -> always i p P -> always (i \+ j) (Inject w p) (fun (m : state) (q : proc this W A) => exists i' j' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet, [/\ m = i' \+ j', i' \In Coh V, network_rely (inj_ext w) this j j' & (exists q' : proc this V A, q = Inject w q' /\ P i' q') \/ (exists v' : A, q = Ret v' /\ P i' (Ret v'))])
Seq : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A B : Type), proc this W B -> (B -> proc this W A) -> proc this W A
aft_inject : forall (V W : world) (K : hooks) (A : Type) (w : injects V W K) (this : nid) (p : proc this V A) (P : A -> state -> Prop) (i j : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet), i \+ j \In Coh W -> after i p P -> after (i \+ j) (Inject w p) (fun (v : A) (m : state) => exists i' j' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet, [/\ m = i' \+ j', i' \In Coh V, network_rely (inj_ext w) this j j' & P v i'])
stepWithInv : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (pr : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv.PWIExports.InductiveInv pr I) (s1 : state) (t : proc this (mkWorld pr) A) (sc : schedule) (s2 : state) (q : proc this W A) (pf : W = mkWorld (InductiveInv.PWIExports.ProtocolWithIndInv ii)), pstep s1 (WithInv pr I ii pf t) sc s2 q <-> (exists v : A, [/\ sc = WithInvRet, t = Ret v, q = Ret v, s2 = s1, s1 \In Coh W & W = mkWorld (InductiveInv.PWIExports.ProtocolWithIndInv ii)]) \/ (exists (sc' : schedule) (t' : proc this (mkWorld pr) A), [/\ sc = WithInvStep sc', q = WithInv pr I ii pf t', W = mkWorld (InductiveInv.PWIExports.ProtocolWithIndInv ii), s1 \...
pcat : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A B : Type), proc this W A -> (A -> Pred (proc this W B)) -> Simpl_Pred (proc this W B)
Actions.send_act_step_sem : forall (W : world) (p : protocol) (this : nid) (l : Label), getProtocol W l = p -> forall st : send_trans (coh p), st \In snd_trans p -> forall (msg : seq nat) (to : nid) (s1 : state) (S : Actions.send_act_safe W this l st msg to s1) (s2 : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet) (r : seq nat), Actions.send_act_step S s2 r -> network_step W this s1 s2
stepSeq : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A B : Type) (s1 : state) (t : proc this W B) (k : B -> proc this W A) (sc : schedule) (s2 : state) (q : proc this W A), pstep s1 (Seq t k) sc s2 q < -> (exists v : B, [/\ sc = SeqRet, t = Ret v, q = k v, s2 = s1 & s1 \In Coh W]) \/ (exists (sc' : schedule) (p' : proc this W B), [/\ sc = SeqStep sc', q = Seq p' k & pstep s1 t sc' s2 p'])
Inductive proc (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) : Type := Unfinished : proc this W A | Ret : A -> proc this W A | Act : action W A this -> proc this W A | Seq : forall B : Type, proc this W B -> (B -> proc this W A) -> proc this W A | Inject : forall (V : world) (K : hooks), injects V W K -> proc this V A ->...-> proc this W A Arguments proc _ _ _%type_scope Arguments Unfinished {this W} {A}%type_scope Arguments Ret [this W] [A]%type_scope Arguments Act [this W] [A]%type_scope Arguments Seq [this W] [A B]%type_scope _ _%function_scope Arguments Inject [this W] [A]%type_scope [V K] Arguments WithInv [this W] [A]%type_scope _ _%function_scope
Act : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type), action W A this -> proc this W A
Actions.a_safe_coh : forall (W : world) (V : Type) (this : nid) (a : Actions.action W V this) (s : state), Actions.a_safe a s -> s \In Coh W
a_safe_coh : forall (W : world) (V : Type) (this : nid) (a : Actions.action W V this) (s : state), Actions.a_safe a s -> s \In Coh W
set_of : forall (W : world) (A : Type) (this : nid), prog W A this -> proc this W A -> Prop
DTbin.prog_of : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s : spec A), DTbin this W s -> prog W A this
ret_set = fun t : proc this W A => t = Unfinished \/ t = Ret x : proc this W A -> Prop
aft_imp : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc this W A) (P1 P2 : A -> state -> Prop), (forall (v : A) (s0 : state), s0 \In Coh W -> P1 v s0 -> P2 v s0) -> after s p P1 -> after s p P2
DTLattice.sup : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s : spec A), Pred (DTbin this W s) -> DTbin this W s
DTLattice.sup_prog : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s : spec A), Pred (DTbin this W s) -> prog W A this
pstep_network_sem : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s1 : state) (t : proc this W A) (sc : schedule) (s2 : state) (q : proc this W A), pstep s1 t sc s2 q -> network_step W this s1 s2
DTLattice.leq : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s : spec A), DTbin this W s -> DTbin this W s -> Prop
Prog : forall (W : world) (A : Type) (this : nid) (set_of : proc this W A -> Prop), set_of Unfinished -> prog W A this
DTLattice.sup_set : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s : spec A), Pred (DTbin this W s) -> proc this W A -> Prop
alw_envs : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s1 : state) (p : proc this W A) (s2 : state) (P : state -> proc this W A -> Prop), always s1 p P -> network_rely W this s1 s2 -> always s2 p P
